specialties.name: Cardiology
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with heart and cardiovascular system disorders

specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with brain, spinal cord, and nervous system disorders

specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with musculoskeletal system including bones, joints, and muscles

specialties.name: Emergency Medicine
specialties.description: Medical specialty for acute care of patients with urgent medical conditions

specialties.name: Pulmonology
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with respiratory system and lung diseases

specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with digestive system and gastrointestinal disorders

specialties.name: Oncology
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with cancer diagnosis, treatment, and prevention

specialties.name: Pediatrics
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with health and medical care of infants, children, and adolescents

specialties.name: Obstetrics
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with pregnancy, childbirth, and postpartum care

specialties.name: Gynecology
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with female reproductive system and women's health

specialties.name: Nephrology
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with kidney diseases and disorders

specialties.name: Urology
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with urinary tract and male reproductive system disorders

specialties.name: ENT (Otolaryngology)
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with ear, nose, throat, and head and neck disorders

specialties.name: Ophthalmology
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with eye and vision disorders

specialties.name: Dermatology

specialties.name: Endocrinology

specialties.name: Psychiatry
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with mental health disorders

specialties.name: Rheumatology
specialties.description: Medical specialty dealing with autoimmune and inflammatory diseases of joints and connective tissue

specialties.name: General Surgery

specialties.name: General Medicine
